title: So many games ruined by Widowmakers
body:
wannabe FaZe quickscope l33t %%%s, kys.

Especially on offense, basically afk.

replies.body:
Yeh not the most useful hero for the attack phase. Just gotta expect that sometimes you'll lose games, and it won't bother you as much.
Anyway, the games gone into lockdown for about 2 weeks. So no Overwatch for a while.
I agree with you, I **HATE** people trying to be Faker
& I agree with you, i HATE people trying to be madlife
